title: Drawing, Page of a drawing book, 1550–1575
markings: Upper part of watermark depicts shield with a praying St. John
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: Two nude men erecting a crucifix upon a base, upon which the younger one is kneeling. The older one leans against a boulder (?). Squared with lead pencil. Verso: A nude young man shown standing and leaning upon a club, directed toward right.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Page of a drawing book, 1550–1575. ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2792.
